00020

00026 template <typename BlkTp_,typename BIDIteratorTp_>
00027 class buf_ostream
00028 {
00029         typedef BlkTp_ block_type;
00030         typedef BIDIteratorTp_ bid_iterator_type;
00031         
00032 protected:
00033         buffered_writer<block_type> writer;
00034         bid_iterator_type current_bid;
00035         int current_elem;
00036         block_type * current_blk;
00037 public:
00038         typedef typename block_type::const_reference const_reference;
00039         typedef typename block_type::reference reference;
00040         typedef buf_ostream<block_type,bid_iterator_type> _Self;
00041                 
00045         buf_ostream(bid_iterator_type first_bid,int nbuffers):
00046                 writer(nbuffers,nbuffers/2),current_bid(first_bid),
00047                 current_elem(0)
00048         {
00049                 current_blk = writer.get_free_block();
00050         }
00051         
00055         _Self & operator << (const_reference record)
00056         {
00057                 current_blk->elem[current_elem++] = record;
00058                 if(current_elem >= block_type::size)
00059                 {
00060                         current_elem = 0;
00061                         current_blk = writer.write(current_blk,*(current_bid++));
00062                 }
00063                 return (*this);
00064         }
00065         
00068         reference current()
00069         {
00070                 return current_blk->elem[current_elem];
00071         }
00072   
00075         reference operator *()
00076         {
00077                 return current_blk->elem[current_elem];
00078         }
00079         
00082         _Self & operator ++ ()
00083         {
00084                 ++current_elem;
00085                 if(current_elem >= block_type::size)
00086                 {
00087                         current_elem = 0;
00088                         current_blk = writer.write(current_blk,*(current_bid++));
00089                 }
00090                 return (*this);
00091         }
00092   
00093         
00095         virtual ~buf_ostream()
00096         {
00097                 assert(current_elem == 0);
00098         }
00099 };
